meanings: to be able to take care of
to celebrate the Chinese New Year
great number of people or things
(before an adjective for exclamatory effect) so
(of two people) close; on intimate terms
to be fond of; to have a tendency to; to be prone to
good (of a movie, book, TV show etc)
person who tries not to offend anyone, even at the expense of principle
good action, deed, thing or work (also sarcastic, "a fine thing indeed")
Daoist or Buddhist ceremony for the souls of the dead
classifier used to indicate number of people
measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
(joining two nouns) and; together with; with (Taiwan pr. [hàn])
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water
classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
Heping District of Shenyang city 沈阳市, Liaoning
Heping or Hoping Township in Taichung County 台中县, Taiwan
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龙江
the back; the rear; the last bit
behind; near the end; at the back
the back; the rear; the last bit
behind; near the end; at the back
life after birth (the period in which one develops through experiences, contrasted with 天)
stroke of a Chinese character (variant of 划)
